titleStmt.title: Christian commemoration, and imitation of saints departed explicated, and pressed from Heb.13.7. Occasioned by the decease of the Reverend Mr. Henry Hurst, lately minister of the gospel in London. By Daniel Burgess.
titleStmt.author: Burgess, Daniel, 1645-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst at the Bible and Three Crowns in Cheapside near Mercers chapel,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.
